short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for Asana that adds video previews, simplifies copying links, and allows disabling images in Board View.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to make life easier for anyone working with Asana, especially for those who can’t change certain built-in functionalities.

Key Features:

	1.	Video Preview in Comments
View videos uploaded from a computer directly in Asana’s task comments without needing external tools.
	2.	Toggle Images in Board View
Easily enable or disable images in Board View for a cleaner visual experience.
	3.	Quick Link Copy for Slack
With CTRL (CMD) held down, clicking the “link” icon on a task copies the task’s name and URL in [task_name](task_link) format, perfect for sharing in Slack.
	4.	Spreadsheet-Friendly Hyperlinks
Hold down CTRL (CMD) + Shift when clicking the “link” icon, and copy a spreadsheet-friendly format: =HYPERLINK("task_link", "task_name"), ideal for Google Sheets or Excel.

Upcoming Features:

	•	Code formatting in comments
	•	Image preview in pop-up instead of a separate page
	•	Auto-scroll to a task in List View when clicking the project name

Stay tuned as we continue to improve and add more features!
